name: WHITE STAR AVIATION PTY LTD
about: White Star Aviation is a boutique Flight Training Academy based in New South Wales, Australia, with facilities at Ballina and Armidale airports. We offer comprehensive flight and ground training, flight examinations, aircraft acquisition, maintenance services, and hangarage. Our programs include private pilot training, commercial pilot training, instrument rating, and multi-engine rating, as well as a Diploma of Aviation program. With experienced instructors and a focus on safety, professionalism, and innovation, we provide personalized support to nurture industry-ready pilots. Our locations in Class ‘G’ airspace ensure a safer and low-traffic environment, ideal for training. We also offer a Trial Introductory Flight and collaborate with local organisations to foster a vibrant aviation community. White Star Aviation is dedicated to empowering individuals for successful careers in aviation.
services:
["Recreational Pilot Certificate (RPC)
Recreational Pilot License (RPL)
Private Pilot License (PPL)
Private IFR Rating (PIFR)
Torres Strait Air Cadet Pilot Program
AVI50222 Diploma of Aviation (Commercial Pilot License – Aeroplane)
Commercial Pilot License (CPL)
AVI50519 Diploma of Aviation (Instrument Rating)
Instrument Rating (IR)
Instructor Rating (FIR)"]
